-e ---

𓎳 ≈ 𓉲 + 𓎲 ≈ 𓏒 @ 𓎴 𓉳

𓂧 𓆑 𓄿 𓆛 𓏥 | (deified as) Abundance | dϥꜣ𓆛 daƒ… ≈ δαψίλεια dapsíleia <> δάπτω daps tāp- "feast" 𓂧 𓆑 𓄿 𓆛 𓏥 | (deified as) Abundance | δƒa > שפע shéfa’ <> ϩⲟⲡ "feast"

𓇋 𓈙 𓏏 𓏥 | possessions, (morning) meal | feast > 𓇋 𓈙 𓏏 𓈒 𓏥 | possessions, (morning) meal | ist, isst, est, esst 𓇋 𓈙 𓏏 𓏴 𓏛 𓏥 | possessions, (morning) meal |

𓄌 𓎱 | New Year's Day (and its Festival) | 𓄍 𓎱 | New Year's Day (and its Festival) | Gnu-Years-Feast

ⲡⲁⲣⲁⲙⲟⲛⲏ 🇬🇷 f. baramoun, the eve of a feast; obligation to continue in service endurance ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲏⲕⲟⲥⲧⲟⲥ , ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲏⲕⲟⲥⲧⲏ 🇬🇷 fiftieth, the feast of the pentacost ⲁⲛⲁⲗⲏⲯⲓⲥ 🇬🇷 f. feast of ascension

ϩⲟⲡ m. feast, marriage feast, bride-chamber <> Hof (machen)
